glosses: Güzelhisar (a neighbourhood in Akyurt district, Ankara Province, Turkey)
Güzelhisar (a neighbourhood in Köprüköy district, Erzurum Province, Turkey)
synonym of Aydın (“a city and province of Turkey”)
synonym of Menemen (“a town and district of Turkey”)

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish كوزل حصار (güzel hisar). By surface analysis, güzel (“nice, beautiful”) + hisar (“castle, fortress, stronghold”).
